name: (GFCHRGWSTAZ) Generic Furro Climbing Hill Racing Game With Something That Aren't Zombies
name_original: (GFCHRGWSTAZ) Generic Furro Climbing Hill Racing Game With Something That Aren't Zombies
description:
(GFCHRGWSTAZ) Generic Furro Climbing Hill Racing Game With Something That Aren't Zombies

Still in early development, testing mechanics and ideias. All graphics and sounds are placeholders for now.

Basically the game is going to be a climbing hill racing game with more mechanics and things to do. Im still thinking what type of creatures/monsters are going to be used as enemies in the game.
